description: Numbers n such that n and 8n + 1 are both prime.
comments: Solutions of the equation (8*n+1)'+n'=2, where n' is the arithmetic derivative of n. [_Paolo P. Lava_, Oct 31 2012]
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (MAGMA) [ p: p in PrimesUpTo(1900) | IsPrime(8*p+1) ]; [From _Klaus Brockhaus_, Dec 21 2008]
crossrefs: Cf. A007519 (primes of form 8n+1), A005123 ((( primes == 1 mod 8 ) - 1)/8). [From _Klaus Brockhaus_, Dec 21 2008]
author: _David W. Wilson_
